abstract: Arrives at Vichy after release from German prison; int
snippet: LISBON, Portugal, Sept. 2 (AP)-- Repeated searchings and thirteen hours of questioning during two days of detention in Spain were reported today by Dr. James V....

headline.main: AMERICAN ASSAILS TREATMENT IN SPAIN; Ambulance Unit Leader Says Officials Sought Data on French Military Plants QUESTIONED FOR 13 HOURS Dr. Sparks Says Party, Including His Wife, Was JailedUnder an Armed Guard

lead_paragraph: LISBON, Portugal, Sept. 2 (AP)-- Repeated searchings and thirteen hours of questioning during two days of detention in Spain were reported today by Dr. James V.
